amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete the provisions of the bill that establish a Housing Evaluation and Accreditation Board.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 25 as printed in the Congressional Record to strike provisions of the bill that would create a Housing Evaluation and Accreditation Board to evaluate the performance of local housing authorities. The amendment would not affect the bill's requirements that a study be conducted on ways to improve current methods of evaluating the performance of housing authorities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Vento amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 200 - 228 (Roll no. 121).
